tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP @LeeStrobel) (NNP Glad) (PRP you)) (VP (VBP are) (ADVP (RB truly)) (VP (VBG enjoying) (NP (NP (DT this) (NN season)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN life)))))) (. .)))
